item.title: Truxton Extreme adds PC version, first details
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/truxton-extreme-adds-pc-version-first-details

  • PC
  • PS5

PC demo available from June 10 to 17.

Development is nearing completion on shoot ’em up revival Truxton Extreme, which will be available for PC alongside its previously announced PlayStation 5 version, publisher THQ Nordic Japan and developer Tatsujin announced. A demo will be available for PC as part of Steam Next Fest: June 2025 Edition from June 10 to 17.

Truxton Extreme is the first all-new entry in the Truxton series, known as Tatsujin in Japan, in 37 years. It was originally announced in September 2023 with a 2024 release window, but was delayed to an unannounced date.

Here are the latest details:

Exhilarating for All! Play Across Various Modes

Truxton Extreme is equipped with a variety of game modes that allow anyone to enjoy the exhilaration of a shoot ’em up, such as the series’ first-ever Story Mode, where players can enjoy a grand story depicting life-or-death battles and human drama in outer space, along with the ever-familiar Arcade Mode and more.

The Story Mode offers a greater sense of immersion with the newly developed “Interactive Digital Comic” system, where lively interactive scenes unfold within comic panels, offering a new experience that fuses shoot ’em up gameplay with comics. In Arcade Mode, players can enjoy endlessly looping, thrilling gameplay while aiming for the high score.

When you defeat enemies, “Pipiru Aliens” will appear, and collecting many of them allows you to develop your very own “Pipiruville.”

By playing repeatedly, your ship levels up, and you will discover something new each time—like gimmicks that can be destroyed using specific weapons at certain locations—offering a new experience to both first-time players and godlike shoot ’em up veterans alike.

Enter the New Age that Fuses Digital Comic with Game

In Truxton Extreme, players can simultaneously enjoy a massive “Interactive Digital Comic” specially developed for integration with the shoot ’em up gameplay.

Story

In a future where humanity has expanded its frontier to seven Earth-like planets… mankind was living peacefully—until it was suddenly attacked by an alien civilization. With its military system long abolished, humanity lost all seven of its colony planets in the invasion. In an effort to restore its defenses, humanity completed the development of an advanced tactical fighter. However, the system was not designed for a living pilot—it required the pilot to abandon their physical body.

Would anyone be willing to make such a sacrifice…? To reclaim the seven lost colony planets and protect Earth from the threat of alien invaders, the heroes who chose this harsh path came to be revered by the people. They were called… “Tatsujin.”

Special Program

Game Center Mikado’s YouTube channel will host “Truxton Extreme Presents Countdown to the Latest Game! An 11-Hours Straight Return to Origin, A Fiery 7-Battle Special!” on June 8 from 12:00 to 23:00 JST. At 20:00 JST that same evening, the special program “Nearly Complete! Truxton Extreme Latest Information Revealed!” will also broadcast.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Psychological adventure game On Donuts and Holes announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/psychological-adventure-game-on-donuts-and-holes-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Face unanswerable questions to reach the ultimate enigmas.

Publisher room6 and developers Atsuki Miyamura and Kako no Nikomi have announced On Donuts and Holes, a psychological adventure game where players must answer “unanswerable questions.” It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A psychological adventure through a dreamy landscape. Face unanswerable questions to reach the ultimate enigmas: Who are you? Who am I?

Tell Me Your Answers to Questions That Don’t Have One

There is a mysterious creature donning a flower wreath, and it only refers to itself as I.

I will ask you questions, and the conversation will progress based on your answers.

“What would you do if you could meet your past self?”

“If you could buy other people’s experiences with money, would you?”

Some of the questions will be things that you may have asked yourself already. Some may lead you to unexplored parts of your mind.

There is no right answer. What matters is what you believe.

After answering a question, you will be shown everyone else’s answers.

How many chose as you did? And why did the others choose differently?

Dive into your own mind as you try to glance at someone else’s.

Lights and Doors for Choices, Within the Warm Embrace of Loneliness

Every door is connected to an answer. Go through the one you chose.

Your choices will change the room that you are in. Take a stroll through this visual representation of your own mind.

Maybe, after you’ve gone through enough doors, you will realize this world’s secrets.

Questions, Answer, and What Comes of Them

Many questions await you. Some will be about common food items, while some will be about matters of life and death. None of them, however, have clear-cut answers.

You might wonder: why am I being asked these things in the first place?

If you realize the reason between all of those questions, you may choose to face the reality hidden behind that simple donut hole.

But do so at your own discretion. If you go too deep, there’s no guarantee you’ll be able to come back up.

Characters

There are just two characters: You and I.

  • I – A creature that loves talking, but remains vanishing and mysterious. “I would like to ask you some questions.”
  • You – The choices you will take belong to you, as they come from your own memories and experiences.

Key Features

A new and improved “rebake” of a game created for a 1-week game jam. It’s time to go Deeper Down the Hole.

  • Over a hundred new questions.
  • A new, expanded plot.
  • Complex interactions between your answers and the plot.
  • Improved graphics and new stages.
  • Backlog functions to see past questions and dialogue.
  • English and Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) support.

item.title: Roguelike action game Reverie in the Moonlight announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/roguelike-action-game-reverie-in-the-moonlight-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Survive the nightmare until dawn.

Publisher and developer room6 has announced Reverie in the Moonlight, a roguelike action game where players, along with their stuffed animals, must defend themselves from the monsters that attack in the night. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

What if this dream never ended? What if we could dream it together?

Reverie in the Moonlight is an action game where, with the help of your stuffed animals, you try to defend yourself from the monsters attacking you night after night.

Nightly Visits

Little Tete’s nights are restless. His dreams are full of horrible monsters attacking him. But then, one night, he meets Luna, and she teaches him how to use his plushies to defend himself.

Cute But Strong

When faced with a monster, Tete can only do one thing: run away. His plushies, however, can actually fight and defeat monsters. Different animals play different roles, with some focusing on short-range attacks, some on long-range shots, and some on supporting their allies. There are 40 types to choose from, so find your favorites and help them protect Tete from the monsters.

  • Ham Jr. – Runs left and right, hitting monsters that get too close with a stick.
  • Snoozy-G – Enjoys sleeping, napping, and resting. Monsters that hit it are slowed down for a while.
  • Striped Angel – When it sees someone in trouble, it always wants to help. It heals Tete up from a distance.

Collect and Strategize

After the monsters’ attack is over, you can shop with the gold you found. You can get new plushies and even buy special items that can make you stronger. Some of them will also give you new weaknesses, so it’s up to you to strategize and prepare for the next attack in the best way possible. There are more than 100 items in the game… Will you be able to collect them all?

Change Clothes to Change Strategies

So, you’ve played the game’s story to the end. Well done. But this is just the start!

You can change Tete’s clothes, choosing from more than 20 costumes. Each one makes him stronger in some ways and weaker in others. If you want to help Tete defeat his nightmares, you’ll have to find the right plushies and items to go with each costume!

  • Moonlight Wizard – Plushies with long-range attacks become stronger, but Tete can only use those. Defending yourself becomes harder, so you’ll have to defeat monsters before they can get close.
  • Nap Cloud – Increasing attack power becomes difficult, but plushies that don’t move around attack twice as fast. Try to find as many stationary friends as you can.
  • Doggy Friend – Tete can only use dog plushies. If you want to win, you’ll need to make good use of their fast respawn speed.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong for Xbox Series launches August 20
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/black-myth-wukong-for-xbox-series-launches-august-20

  • Xbox Series

One year after its PlayStation 5 and PC release.

Game Science will release the long-delayed Xbox Series version of action RPG Black Myth: Wukong on August 20, exactly one year after it launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on August 20, 2024, the developer announced. Pre-orders will open on June 18.

Here is an overview of the game, via Game Science:

About

Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

Key Features

  • Explore a Land of Vast Wonders – A world unseen, where new sights rise with every stride. Enter a fascinating realm filled with the wonders and discoveries of ancient Chinese mythology! As the Destined One, you shall venture through breathtaking landscapes in the classic tale of Journey to the West, creating a new epic of uncharted adventures.
  • Confront Mighty Foes, Old and New – Heroic Monkey, might and fame, adversaries rise, to test his name. One of the major highlights of Journey to the West is its diverse cast of adversaries, each with unique strengths. As the Destined One, you shall encounter powerful foes and worthy rivals throughout your journey. Fearlessly engage them in epic battles that know no surrender.
  • Temper Your Mastery of Varied Spells – Spells unbound, knowledge’s flight, infinite abilities take their height. Spells, transformations, and magic vessels in all manifestations, complementary yet adversarial, have long been iconic combat elements in Chinese mythology. As the Destined One, aside from mastering various staff techniques, you can also freely combine different spells, abilities, weapons, and equipment to find the winning formula that best suits your combat style.
  • Discover Heartfelt Tales Behind Every Facade – Within beings of every kind lies the story of a life. Beneath the ferocity and craftiness of your foes lies an engaging tapestry of their origins, personalities, and motivations waiting to be revealed. As the Destined One, you will uncover the stories behind a variety of characters, delving beyond your battles with them, to taste the love and hate, greed and fury they once had and still carry with them.
